content.verbatim_text: Processing shall be lawful only if and to the extent that at least one of the following applies: (a) the data subject has given consent; (b) processing is necessary for the performance of a contract; (c) processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation; (d) processing is necessary to protect vital interests; (e) processing is necessary for a task carried out in the public interest; (f) processing is necessary for legitimate interests pursued by the controller.
content.title: Lawfulness of processing

structured_data.relevance_to_odgs: Legal basis for all data processing — prerequisite for any ODGS metric computation

interpretation.applicability: All organizations processing personal data of EU residents
